title: Person Summary for Chip Processing
description: A summary of a person analyzed from a chip image

child.description: Indicates whether the person is a child

gender.description: String indicating the gender of the person

wearingHardHat.description: Indicates whether person is wearing a hard hat

highlyVisible.description: Indicates whether person is wearing highly-visible clothing (such as a construction vest)

clothesUpperBodyColor.description: Indicates colors found on the person's upper body

clothesLowerBodyColor.description: Indicates colors found on the person's lower body
